episode_metadata.title: The Dirty Secret: Even the Experts Are Making It Up
episode_metadata.subtitle: Why the people building AI are just as confused as you are—and why that's actually reassuring

narrative_architecture.central_thesis: The world's leading AI experts systematically acknowledge uncertainty and confusion about AI development, creating a reassuring demonstration that scientific integrity trumps false confidence in this critical technology domain.
narrative_architecture.hook_strength: High - challenges audience expectations with authoritative source
narrative_architecture.resolution_satisfaction: High - transforms anxiety into appreciation for intellectual integrity

cold_open.key_element: What if I told you the world's smartest AI researchers just admitted they have no idea what they're doing?

introduction.content_focus: Show setup, intellectual humility theme introduction, episode overview
introduction.brand_integration: Establish 'celebrating what we know AND what we don't know'

key_segments.key_quote: The future of general-purpose AI is remarkably uncertain

key_segments.focus: Authority establishment - Yoshua Bengio, 100 experts, 30 nations
key_segments.emphasis: This isn't fringe uncertainty - this is mainstream admission

key_segments.key_question: Why does this feel surprising when it should feel reassuring?

act_1_hook.intellectual_humility_moment: Even the smartest people admit what they don't know
act_1_hook.transition: But here's where it gets really interesting...

act_2_exploration.content_focus: Deep dive into expert-public perception gap with psychological explanations
